original_title: Handbags: The Window to a Woman's Soul
overview: 2012 French documentary where the interviewer gets 6 seemingly random women to empty their handbags and then asks probing questions to get to their "soul".  Simone 33, a model.  Ilhem 36, a sports coach. Caroline 33, a curator.  Anne-Sophie 29, a press attache. Catherine 43,  a teacher.  Valentina 23, a student.  French with English sub-titles.
tagline: The Window to a Woman's Soul
title: Handbags: The Window to a Woman's Soul
